data.title: Charlie Chaplin - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: Charlie Chaplin was a British comedian, filmmaker, and composer who rose to fame in the silent era. He is best known for his character "The Tramp," which became a symbol of the downtrodden during the Great Depression.
data.text:
Definition

Charlie Chaplin was a British comedian, filmmaker, and composer who rose to fame in the silent era. He is best known for his character "The Tramp," which became a symbol of the downtrodden during the Great Depression.
